data.prayer: Father, convict the 9,644 believers in Surin to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Surin, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Surin. Through your servants plant 298 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary: On average, 186 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Surin, Thailand.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide seekers in Surin, Thailand to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Surin who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, 1.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Surin to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 9,644 believers in the state of Surin to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.section_summary:
the state of Surin, Thailand has a population of 1,491,400.

We estimate Surin has 9,644 people who might know Jesus, 9,844 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,471,912 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,644 believers in Surin to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests
